summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx for shipping services provided to J Epstein & Co Inc. It details various charges for transportation and special handling, along with the dates of service and recipients involved. The invoice highlights multiple shipments made by the company during July 2000.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated July 24, 2000, and details shipping charges for J Epstein & Co Inc.
Total charges for the services rendered amount to USD 174.78.
Multiple packages were shipped during July 2000, with various recipients and senders involved.
The document includes references to fuel surcharges applied by FedEx.
Several individuals associated with J Epstein & Co Inc are mentioned as senders and recipients of packages.
